allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Python project structure with pyproject.toml

- Create src/chatfilter/ package layout
- Add pyproject.toml with dependencies \(telethon, fastapi, uvicorn, pytest\)
- Configure pytest, ruff, and mypy
- Add .gitignore for Python projects

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Pydantic data models for Chat, Message, and AnalysisResult

Domain models with strict validation independent of Telethon internals:
- Chat/ChatType: chat representation with ID/title/type validators
- Message: message with author_id and timestamp validation
- ChatMetrics: computed metrics \(message count, unique authors, history hours\)
- AnalysisResult: combines chat with metrics, includes is_active computed field

All models include .fake\(\) factory methods for testing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
